reviewText: Torn: McCall tries to divide his time between defending a woman from her abusive husband and settling with an old enemy. guests stars are Zohra Lambert and Saul Rubinek and Something Green: The ex-wife of a European diplomat asks McCall to help her retrieve her son from his father before he can leave the country with the boy and $10 million in mob money. Macauley Culkin - Home Alone star and Richard Jordan in his reaccuring role as Harley Gage. Both episodes are pretty Good.
